titles.title: Dream after dream, You are speaking to me, breathing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Dream after dream, You are speaking to me, breathing
Word after word of kingdom come
Here at Your feet, I can see the unseen, truly
One look at You and I'm undone

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
I run to the throne room
I run to the throne room

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
And I fall on my face
With angels and saints and all I can say is
Нoly, holy, holy are You
My heart can't contain
The we ight of Your name and all I can say is
Нoly, holy, holy are You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Grace upon grace, all my Fear falls away, only
Your perfect love for me remains, oh
Time after time, You stay close by my side, burning
Fire inside I can't contain

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I run to the throne room
Before You, the only One
I run to the throne room
Before You, I'm overcome
